Content.Name: Emphasis Courses
Content.Title: Emphasis Courses
Content.BodyCopy:
These classes are taught as a 12-credit grouping.

When you register it may appear that the courses will conflict but they do not These classes may be different from what is listed on your degree audit. Register for the classes listed below, not the ones listed on your degree audit.

IF YOU HAVE PROBLEMS REGISTERING FOR COURSES LISTED BELOW, PLEASE SEND AN EMAIL TO STAIGERA@BYUI.EDU    BE SURE TO INCLUDE THE COURSE NUMBER, SECTION NUMBER AND YOUR I#.

Finance

All students register for B 401, 410, 428, and 433.

Register for your focus area:

  • Advanced Investments (B 411 and B 424) OR
  • Money and Banking (B 432 and B 424) OR
  • New Venture Finance (B 424D and B 475)

Please note:  The time for the classes may not show up on the registration system.  B 411, 424, 424D, 428, 432, 433, and 475 meet between 10:45-12:15 daily.  These classes rotate through that time slot.  A schedule will be sent to you before classes start.  In contrast, B 401 and 410 will meet as listed in the registration system. 

Marketing

11-1:45 daily

All students register for B 439, B 443, B 446, B 448, B 452, and B 453

Register for your focus area:

  • B 451 Internet Marketing OR
  • B 457 Retailing AND Comm 231A Advertising (there may be a problem with registering for B 457.  If you encounter and error please email staigera@byui.edu and she will authorize you to add the course).

Please note:  classes rotate through the assigned time slot.  A schedule will be sent to you via email before classes start.

Supply Chain Management

11-1:45 daily

All students register for B 461, B 466, B 468, and B 478

Please note:  classese rotate through the assigned time slot.
